content.query:
USE logical_DWH_nyc_taxi go


drop view if EXISTS silver.view_partitioning_trip_data go
 
create view silver.view_partitioning_trip_data as 

select 
result_set.* ,
result_set.filepath(1) as year,
result_set.filepath(2) as month
    from OPENROWSET(
    bulk 'silver_layer/partitioning_trip_data/year=*/month=*/**',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'logical_DWH_exDS',
    FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
)with(
        VendorID INT,
        lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
        lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
        store_and_fwd_flag CHAR(1),
        RatecodeID INT,
        PULocationID INT,
        DOLocationID INT,
        passenger_count INT,
        trip_distance FLOAT,
        fare_amount FLOAT,
        extra FLOAT,
        mta_tax FLOAT,
        tip_amount FLOAT,
        tolls_amount FLOAT,
        ehail_fee INT,
        improvement_surcharge FLOAT,
        total_amount FLOAT,
        payment_type INT,
        trip_type INT,
        congestion_surcharge FLOAT
)
as result_set go


select * from silver.view_partitioning_trip_data where year = '2020' and month = '04' go
